column1: Zahir Pir is a city in Rahim Yar Khan District
column3: Pakistan. It is located on N-5.It has Motorway Exchange from M-5 also. Zahir Pir is connected with Rahim Yar Khan Distt HQ (65 km)Khanpur Tehsil HQ(25 km)
column4: Chachran Sharif on Indus River Bank (11 km) and connected to Kot Mitthan (25 km)via Benazir Bhutto Shaheed Bridge.
